title: DID in Congo Universities
description: With hundreds of universities created since 1994, checking credentials is costly and sometimes impossible, leading to cases of fraud.
solution: Implement Atala PRISM DID among several private universities in DRC (Goma & Bukavu) which are incentivized to prevent fraud among applicants
experience:
Frédéric Samvura: 10+ years in programming, plutus pioneer member, owner of post-secondary institution ISDR/GL (www.isdrgl.org) in DRC

WADA
